title: Beepberry! Tiny Pi-based Blackberry cyberdeck #shorts
description:
The Beepberry is a tiny portable Blackberry-esque cyberdeck powered by a Raspberry Pi Zero W (I'm using a Zero 2 W in mine).

I bought this back when it was announced, but right now it's sold out; sign up to be notified when it's back at https://shop.sqfmi.com/products/beepberry

Find out more in my blog post: https://www.jeffgeerling.com/blog/2023/messing-beepberry
